data.title: Fabio Testi
data.meta_description: Posts about Fabio Testi written by dcpfilm
data.text:
Continuing on my recent giallo run. I’ve meant to see What Have You Done To Solange? for years. I should amend my previous post about Blood and Black Lace. This is a giallo with a good plot. Fabio Testi (who really looks … Continue reading →

The Garden of the Finzi-Continis is probably Vittorio De Sica’s greatest film. For me it surpasses both The Bicycle Thieves and Umberto D, his neorealist masterpieces. This WWII film is filled with longing, as though the pre-war days are being seen through … Continue reading →
